recipe.title: Passion-Fruit Caipirinha
ingredients: 3 oz (6 tablespoons) pure passion-fruit juice (preferably Looza brand)
instructions: Add lime wedges and sugar to an 8-ounce short glass and muddle by pounding and pressing with a wooden spoon until sugar is dissolved. Fill glass with ice and add passion-fruit juice and cachaça, then stir well.
